item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "When someone shows you who they are believe them; the first time." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Pretty women wonder where my secret lies. I'm not cute or built to suit a fashion model's size But when I start to tell them, They think I'm telling lies. I say, It's in the reach of my arms The span of my hips, The stride of my step, The curl of my lips. I'm a woman Phenomenally. Phenomenal woman, That's me." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "I've learned that regardless of your relationship with your parents, you'll miss them when they're gone from your life." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "If I am not good to myself, how can I expect anyone else to be good to me?" -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Out of the huts of history's shame I rise Up from a past that's rooted in pain I rise I'm a black ocean, leaping and wide, Welling and swelling I bear in the tide. Leaving behind nights of terror and fear I rise Into a daybreak that's wondrously clear I rise Bringing the gifts that my ancestors gave, I am the dream and the hope of the slave. I rise I rise I rise." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "Had I known that the heart breaks slowly, dismantling itself into unrecognizable plots of misery... had I known yet I would have loved you, your brash and insolent beauty, your heavy comedic face and knowledge of sweet delights, but from a distance I would have left you whole and wholly for the delectation of those who wanted more and cared less." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "As far as I knew white women were never lonely, except in books. White men adored them, Black men desired them and Black women worked for them." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: Leon add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Leon add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Leon add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Leon add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Leon add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Leon add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Leon add a quote by Elie Wiesel
item.description: "The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference. The opposite of art is not ugliness, it's indifference. The opposite of faith is not heresy, it's indifference. And the opposite of life is not death, it's indifference." -- Elie Wiesel

item.title: Leon add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Leon add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Leon add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Leon add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Leon add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "An ordinary beginning, something that would have been forgotten had it been anyone but her. But as he shook her hand and met those striking emerald eyes, he knew before he'd taken his next breath that she was the one he could spend the rest of his life looking for but never find again. She seemed that good, that perfect, while a summer wind blew through the trees." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Leon add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Leon add a quote by Stephenie Meyer
item.description: "He's like a drug for you, Bella." -- Stephenie Meyer

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "For you, a thousand times over" -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "It may be unfair, but what happens in a few days, sometimes even a single day, can change the course of a whole lifetime..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "it always hurts more to have and lose than to not have in the first place." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Boys, Laila came to see, treated friendship the way they treated the sun: its existence undisputed; its radiance best enjoyed, not beheld directly." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "I will follow you to the ends of the world." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "Behind every trial and sorrow that He makes us shoulder, God has a reason." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Leon add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this, in which there is no I or you, so intimate that your hand upon my chest is my hand, so intimate that when I fall asleep your eyes close." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Leon add a quote by Sarah Dessen
item.description: "There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment." -- Sarah Dessen

item.title: Leon add a quote by Diana Gabaldon
item.description: "I stood still, vision blurring, and in that moment, I heard my heart break. It was a small, clean sound, like the snapping of a flower's stem." -- Diana Gabaldon
